channel.title: Need help with changing how much xp dragon bones give!
channel.description: Hey im on a 317 and i need to know how to change how much xp you get by burying dragon bones and by using them on a prayer altar, its glitched and gives me 100k xp per bone, how do i change this?

item.title: Need help with changing how much xp dragon bones give!
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

Search the atlar id in client.java and look around it.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with changing how much xp dragon bones give!

item.title: Need help with changing how much xp dragon bones give!
item.dc:creator: @_Mark ``Mark
item.description:
@_Mark wrote:

I assume you use delta?

Look into your player.java

Then you will see this:

public class Prayer {
public int CheckPrayStat(Client c) {
int bonus = (( 7 + c.playerBonus[11]/2) * 1000);
return bonus;
}

Then you simply have to change the *1000.

(I’m not sure though, as I have just started…)

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with changing how much xp dragon bones give!
